The §6Satellite Builder§r is a machine commonly §eused to make satellites and to duplicate Space Station or Planet §6ID Chips§r.

The machine is a §aMultiblock Structure§r; §eThe multiblock's materials are in the task itself§r.

To craft the Satellite Builder, you'll need two §6Basic Circuit§rs, a §6Data Storage Unit§r, a §6Hopper§r, a §6Titanium Plate§r, a §6Machine Structure§r, §eany kind of §6Moter§r, an §6Anvil§r, and a §6Saw Blade Assembly§r.


Refer to this website for the slot's usage: {Embed}TypeLink;http://arwiki.dmodoomsirius.me/AdvancedRocketry/1.12.2/blocks/SatelliteAssemblingMachine.php;300;15;AR Wiki - Satellite Builder{Embed}
